duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform manual material handling and use hand tools, knives, machinery, and equipment in a physically demanding environment.
Continuous standing for long periods, walking long distances on wet and slippery surfaces, and lifting heavy objects up to 60 lbs.
Working in cold and hot environments, using and maintaining personal protective equipment, and handling sharp cutting tools.
Following oral and written instructions, and covering for line workers as needed.
Complying with federal inspection programs, maintaining regular attendance, and working scheduled hours, including mandatory overtime when required.
